meta.name: description
meta.content: Universal Institute Charter School is one of the establishments of the Universal Family of Schools in Philadelphia, PA. Our academic program aims to teach students important skills that they can use in their future careers. Feel free to get in touch with our team to learn more about our institution.

div.class: fl-row fl-row-full-width fl-row-bg-color fl-node-5e6e9b6becf69 fl-row-custom-height fl-row-align-center

b.u: All Universal Schools Closed Until Further Notice

p.span: Governor Wolf announced that all schools will remain closed until further notice as they work to mitigate the spread of COVID-19 and protect the health of all Pennsylvanians. Thank you for your patience through these uncertain and constantly evolving circumstances.

span.span: Please read the most recent letter from Dr. Penny Nixon

p.span: Grab-and-go meal sites continue to operate for our students. Updated locations and times are HERE.

K-12 Remote Learning Packets continue to be available on each Universal School's site. It is our hope that all students in the City of Philadelphia will engage in learning activities during this very difficult time.
Find your school HERE or more activities HERE.

div.span: Please visit the Coronavirus Information Hub often for the most up-to-date information, as it becomes available.
Thank you for flexibility and understanding during this difficult time. Please stay safe.

div.class: fl-row fl-row-full-width fl-row-bg-photo fl-node-5c4865714ccb6 fl-row-custom-height fl-row-align-center fl-row-bg-overlay

a.span: Universal Institute Contnuity of Education Plan

p.span: Please take the time to complete our at-home Survey:

div.p: In response to the spread of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), the leadership team at Universal Institute Charter School has compiled academic work for all scholars in grades K-8.

Image: The teachers and staff at Universal Institute Charter School celebrated their First Day of School by hosting an African Themed Welcoming with African drummers and the teachers and staff wore African print garments.

Video: "THE GIVE AWAY IN SOUTH PHILADELPHIA MADE GOING BACK TO SCHOOL EASIER FOR FAMILIES. THE PHILADELPHIA SHERIFF'S OFFICE GAVE OUT MORE THAN 50 BOOK BACKS TO STUDENTS IN NEED UNIVERSAL INSTITUTE CHARGER SCHOOL. THE OFFICERS GREETED THE STUDENTS AND TOLD THEM TO HAVE AN AWESOME SCHOOL YEAR." -ABC 6 Action News,

div.class: uabb-modal uabb-drag-fix uabb-center-modal uabb-modal-content uabb-modal-custom uabb-effect-1 uabb-aspect-ratio-16_9

uabb-module-content uabb-button-wrap uabb-creative-button-wrap uabb-button-width-full uabb-creative-button-width-full uabb-button-center uabb-creative-button-center uabb-button-reponsive-center uabb-creative-button-reponsive-center

div.p: The mission of the Universal Institute Charter School is to provide a school to career academic program that emphasizes self-sufficiency, civic responsibility and problem solving through mathematics, language arts and the sciences. The educational program utilizes community resources within the school's immediate neighborhood through a variety of before, during, and after school partnerships with families, businesses, social agencies, civic groups and community organizations to enhance the academic program and to support students and their families.

h2.span: Connecting Parents and Schools to Increase Achievement

div.p: We encourage you to participate in one of the many opportunities such as the Home and School Association, School Advisory Councils (SAC) and/or volunteer as a teacher assistant/aide, food pantry worker, or just read to our scholars.
For more information, contact the Universal Institute Charter School at (215) 732-2876 or send us an email.

li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page current-menu-item page_item page-item-34 current_page_item

a.p:
Corporate Office
800 S. 15th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19146

Central Education Office
1427 Catharine Street, 5th Floor
Philadelphia, PA 19146

div.p: The Universal Education mission is to provide a rich and high quality education for every scholar to prepare them for college, technical school, entrepreneurships that leads to a sustainable career in the 21st century and build altruistic alumni who contribute to the transformation of their communities as future leaders and positive members of society.
